evoter.server.dao.test

Class TestSubjectDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • evoter.server.dao.test.TestSubjectDAO

  • @ContextConfiguration(locations="classpath:applicationContextTest.xml")
@Transactional
@TransactionConfiguration(defaultRollback=true)
public class TestSubjectDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Make test cases for SubjectDAO and SubjectDAOImpl
    Author:
    btdiem
